original_title: Phoenix Industries Certified as a Great Place To Work
original_body_lines: Phoenix Industries, a leader in the manufacturing of plastic products, was recently certified as a Great Place to Work, which is the global authority on a workplace culture that has certified thousands of companies in more than 60 countries. This certification enables companies to benchmark themselves against the world’s best. Phoenix Industries believes that its workforce is its greatest asset, and strives to enable a culture of mutual respect, trust, and collaboration. The company offers a wide range of benefits, including competitive compensation, comprehensive health insurance, and generous paid time off, as well as a variety of opportunities for professional development and career advancement.

This prestigious certification is a testament to the company’s commitment to creating a positive and inclusive work environment for all. The certification process includes an anonymous employee survey and an in-depth audit of the company’s policies, practices, and culture. Phoenix claims that the predominant value of this process to the organization, even more than the certification itself, is the in-depth insights revealed to them from the responses of their team. The information revealed by the in-depth audit has equipped the organization with the right tools to make positive changes in the organization that will create a meaningful impact. Phoenix looks forward to continuing its journey as a Great Place to Work certified organization, as the company continues to provide its team with the support, resources, and opportunities they need to thrive and grow both personally and professionally.
